description: The requirement is for colour meters
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### General Information

* **Procurement Reference Number**: cb-700-99054473
* **Procurement Amendment Number**: 4
* **Procurement Title**: **Purchase of Chroma Meter** / **Acquisition de Chromomètre**
* **Publication Date**: January 17, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 2, 2024, at 14:00:00

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Classification**: Light and wave generating and measuring equipment (UNSPSC 41115300)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

### Procurement Status

* **Procurement Status**: Expired

### Procurement Requirements

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals to purchase two (2) colorimeters, photoelectric, with the following specifications:

* **Manufacturer**: KONICA MINOLTA BUSINESS SOLUTIONS U.S.A., INC.
* **Part Number**: CS-150
* **Quantity**: 2 units
* **Unit of Issue**: Each
* **Delivery Locations**:
	+ 7 CFSD Edmonton, 195 Ave & 82 St (Ordance Ch), Lancaster Park, AB, Canada
	+ 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre, Dame St E., Montreal, QC, Canada

Bidders are required to provide a Certificate of Conformance from the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) for any equivalent or substitute products proposed. Items 1 and 2 are subject to the Controlled Goods Program.

### Evaluation Criteria

* **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Contact Information

* **Point of Contact**: Joseph Catanzariti
* **Email Address**: joseph.catanzariti@forces.gc.ca
* **Telephone Number**: (819) 939-4271
* **Language(s) of Communication**: English and French

### Document Availability

The tender documents can be obtained from the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

The tender closing date is February 2, 2024, at 14:00:00. Late submissions will not be accepted. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

---

### French Version

* **Procuration Reference Number**: cb-700-99054473
* **Procuration Amendment Number**: 4
* **Procuration Title**: **Achat de Chromom
